Thanks for the upload....

@Daman4Iife - Looking forward to your upload of this w/ subs sir! And if I may, please do make it .mp4, .avi or still .mkv as to why .avi/.mp4 to me, they can be played directly in our PS3 no need of conversion. As for .mkv videos I need to use WinAvi All-in-One converter though I doubt it can reduce the quality of the movie. 

The movie was great, fast paced while still introducing important characters and happenings, the 3D CGI also blended well w/ the armors and weapons but not that well on the characters particularly the Zodd part only a few hand drawn animation of Zodd was made, all fight scenes were astounding and captivating and it gives me the itch to watch the 2nd movie.
JUdirek PS3MediaServer Can save you the time of Converting the file or Using Mp4box can also Help.
